Class Enquiry

Object
Enquiry
public class Enquiry extends Object
Model representing an enquiry from an applicant about a BTO project

  • Constructor Details

    • Enquiry

      public Enquiry(Applicant applicant, BTOProject project, String message)
      Constructor for creating a new enquiry
      Parameters:
      applicant - The applicant making the enquiry
      project - The project the enquiry is about
      message - The enquiry message

    • Enquiry

      public Enquiry(String enquiryId, Applicant applicant, BTOProject project, String message, String reply, LocalDateTime createdAt, LocalDateTime repliedAt)
      Constructor for creating an enquiry with all fields
      Parameters:
      enquiryId - The unique ID of the enquiry
      applicant - The applicant making the enquiry
      project - The project the enquiry is about
      message - The enquiry message
      reply - The reply to the enquiry
      createdAt - The date and time the enquiry was created
      repliedAt - The date and time the enquiry was replied to
